name: The Mask (itch)
description: You are trapped in a scary house and you have to escape. You don't remember how you got there but you know you have to break out. The horror house is full of puzzles which need to be solved in order to get out. But there's a catch. While solving the puzzles, you need to keep distance with The Mask. If you get too close, he will knock you out and the next day will start. Be careful, because you have only 5 days.
